general.fullName: Kimmie Wong - High Ticket Sales Specialist
general.headline: Helping business owners Multiply their High-End Conversions on a Pure Commission Basis
general.description:
Let me ask you:

1. Do you want to increase your sales conversions?
2. Do you want to save time, money and/or mental energy from selling?
3. Do you want to improve your lead generation/sales funnel?

If you answered YES to any of the above, I may be able to help.

I help business owners close high-end B2C/B2B products and services over the phone, on a strict 100% performance basis.

How I close is what makes me different.

I connect with pre-qualified prospects on a personal level, lead conversations using proven techniques and philosophies, to help them close themselves on your offering, within 45 minutes.

Through the closing process, I will ensure pre-qualified prospects are the ideal fit for your products and services, truly benefiting from what you do, otherwise they will be disqualified.

At the end of day, it comes down to results, and I am driven to deliver results to my clients.

I am not for everyone.

But we may be able to work together if you:

✓ Are an established coach, influencer, thought leader, authority, or marketer with a solid track record.

✓ Have a high-end program or service with a minimum price of $5000.

✓ Your program or service delivers transformative value to people.

✓ Have a consistent and predictable lead generating system that nurtures qualified leads/prospects.

✓ Are looking for a professional closer and NOT a salesperson, that works on a pure commission basis.

If you could see us being a fit, and is serious about leveraging, I would be happy to set aside sometime to connect with you.

Book a Call with Kimmie

jobs.jobTitle: Founder of The Mind of Femme
jobs.location: Melbourne, Sydney, Canberra, Brisbane, Adelaide, Perth : Australia
jobs.description:
Introducing The Mind of Femme - a new initiative that is committed to increasing the visibility of women in Australia (and abroad) who are capturing our attention through their determination to drive change in the world as we know it.

The Mind of Femme aims to become a national institution, widely regarded for our agenda-setting, authoritative journalism, covering news and conversations, bespoke events and all things that matter to women.

​We explore a collection of themes women care about such as; style and power to culture and identity - to make her feel more understood and less alone. 

The Mind of Femme aims to bring the conversation and issues to you through innovative features, galleries, conversations and bespoke events.

So, what does The Mind of Femme mean? It can mean whatever you want it to mean: perhaps it’s a shoulder to cry on, or a caffeine jolt on a lazy day.

One thing is for sure, The Mind of Femme is more than just a website. 

To find out more: visit www.mindoffemme.com.au

I began by working at Ready Workforce for two months, which is Chandler Macleod's labour hire business.  My second rotation was with Diversiti, which is Chandler Macleod's IT recruitment brand.  My third rotation was with Recruitment Solutions, which is Chandler Macleod's office support division. Middleton executive was born out of a passion for recruitment, the desire to help people succeed, and the determination to create a superior service that works for both clients and candidates. Our unique approach is underpinned by a dynamic recruitment model and lean, collaborative and flexible working methods that always deliver results.

Every day there are businesses creating amazing products and services that are changing the world. Behind those services, those unique products, and those game-changing ideas is one important factor: the people. That's what we're here for, and we have no other agenda other than your success. We genuinely love what we do; and love being able to really connect with our clients and candidates by building genuine relationships.

We're extremely proud of the impressive client base we've built over the past ten years, and have become global specialists at scaling growing tech companies by helping them build world-class product and tech teams. As a partner and extension to your business, we will invest the time and energy in getting to know your culture and then pitch your brand to attract the world's best talent, guaranteeing an exceptional candidate experience every time.

general.headline: Managing Director at R2R Melbourne
general.description:
After working in management positions within accounting & finance for 7 years I decided to transition my skill set into recruitment and I haven’t looked back since!

I have recruited for both private and public sector within Accounting & Finance, Sales & Marketing, HR, Communications, Office Support and Rec 2 Rec. After managing a Rec 2 Rec Melbourne branch for over three years and having huge success I decided to launch my own business, R2R Melbourne in 2015.

I have achieved outstanding results so far in my career and have started desks and branches from scratch. I have a proven track record (and a stack of testimonials!)

I pride myself on my relationship management skills, ability to listen and act with a sense of urgency but most importantly my ability to get it right and ensure that top class service is delivered at all times.

If you are an experienced recruitment professional looking for your next move or an experienced B2B sales professional looking for a career change into recruitment, please contact me for a confidential discussion on +61 405 833 876 or email me on Leanne@R2Rmelbourne.com.au

jobs.description:
Having worked in the rec 2 rec market since 2012, I decided to establish my own business within R2R and have carefully chosen and selected the particular agencies that I feel are a cut above the rest.

Recruiters are always in demand & when you find yourself in the job market looking for a role in recruitment it can be an overwhelming process. Every agency say they have the best database, the best culture and the best commission structure – but remember, you are being sold to by a sales person!! What every recruiter needs is a good, honest and trustworthy R2R. Someone they can meet with and say ‘ this is me, these are my strengths and this is what I want, where is the best place for me?’ That is where I come into things.
 
I have spent a lot of time meeting with most agencies across Melbourne, not only have I met with these agencies, the owners & managers but I have also met with recruiters who work for them, I hear both sides of the stories and trust me, in the recruitment market in Melbourne nothing stays in the dark for long! If there is something untoward or suspicious about an agency OR a recruiter it is very easy to find out.

My opinions to both my clients & candidates is always an open & honest opinion, this is something I absolutely pride myself in.

I have extremely strong relationships with all of my clients & have placed a number of successful recruiters at each client, so I have detailed inside information from both the client & candidate. I have placed Directors, GM’s, BDM’s. account managers, divisional managers, senior consultants & trainee consultants. I have a stack of testimonials which I am very proud of and I will continue to give an excellent service to everyone I work with. 

So if you are in a situation where you are considering your next move in the Melbourne market then get in touch today for a confidential discussion on +61 405 833 876 or email me on Leanne@R2RMelbourne.com.au

At Lime Resourcing I managed the VIC, NZ & UAE divisions. I specialised in the placement of recruitment professionals based in Melbourne, New Zealand & UAE, working with candidates at all levels from resourcer through to C Suite roles within recruitment, nationally and internationally. 

Partnering with clients and consultants across all sectors (including Banking, Finance & Accounting, Healthcare, IT&T, Engineering, Professional Support, Sales & Marketing, HR, Supply Chain & Logistics)

general.headline: CEO & Founder at Flamingo AI Ltd (ASX: FGO)
general.description:
Dr Catriona Wallace is an entrepreneur in the Artificial Intelligence field. Catriona is the CEO & Founder of high-profile Artificial Intelligence FinTech and ASX Listed company (ASX: FGO) Flamingo AI. 

Flamingo AI provides unique machine learning based Cognitive Virtual Assistants, ROSIE and MAGGIE, that large Financial Services companies deploy to improve online sales conversion rates and improve customer service efficiency. Flamingo AI also provides LIBBY (short for self organizing library) which analyzes large volumes of unstructured conversational based text as well as the 'Brain', the machine learning engine that other tech companies can use to power their customer interactions. Clients include Fortune 100 and ASX 100 financial services companies.

Based in NYC and Sydney, Dr Wallace has been acknowledged as one of Australia's 100 Most Influential Women, was recently awarded Australia's top Woman in Finance award and is Advance Australia's winner of the expats working abroad Technology & Innovation award.

Catriona is also one of the world’s most cited experts on the Future of Customer Experience, Artificial Intelligence and Bot Strategy. Catriona also sits on the Board of AADL.

Catriona has a PhD in Organizational Behavior:Human Technology Interaction and has founded three other businesses - customer experience design firm, Fifth Quadrant, market research firm, ACA Research and women’s co-working space, The Ventura. Catriona is also a high profile philanthropist, human rights activist and mother of five.

Specialties: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Digital Transformation; Customer Experience Strategy, Customer Experience Design & Research (Global), Innovation, Outsourcing and IT Tender Management; Data Analytics; Big Data; Multi-channel Strategy;  Contact Centre Service Operation; Customer Experience Analyst; Contact Centre Industry Benchmarking Studies (Asia Pacific and Nth America), Location Assessments, Investment Attraction

jobs.description:
Based in NYC and Sydney, Flamingo Ai is an Enterprise SaaS company in the Artificial Intelligence (AI) & Machine Learning field, providing Cognitive platforms and Conversational AI. 

Flamingo Ai provides unique machine learning based Cognitive Virtual Assistants, ROSIE and MAGGIE, that large Financial Services companies deploy to improve online sales conversion rates and improve customer service efficiency. Flamingo Ai also provides LIBBY (short for self-organizing library) a platform that analyzes large volumes of unstructured and conversational based text, as well as the 'Brain', the machine learning engine that other tech companies can use to power their customer interactions. Clients include Fortune 100 and ASX 100 financial services companies.

Flamingo Ai is listed on the Australian Securities Exchange (ASX) under the ticker code FGO.

Key clients:
Include: US based Fortune 100 companies insurance, banking, insurance finance, investment and large Australian Financial Services firms

The Ventura is Australia's first significant Co-working Space for women-led businesses. Based in prime location at 234 Sussex Street, Sydney, The Ventura provides working space and supporting services for women CEOs, Founders and Co-Founders and their teams (of course who usually have men!).

The Ventura, provides access to the entrepreneurs' ecosystem in Australia and the US, providing women with connections into the investment community, to technologists, legal services,   accounting and much more.

The Ventura has been designed to support women in how they want to work, including having areas for children to be on-site.

In November 2015, The Ventura was acquired by One Roof, women's co-working spaces based in LA, Melbourne and now Sydney www.oneroofwomen.com

St Vincent de Paul Society NSW is a not-for-profit organisation with 16,000 members, volunteers and over 2000 employees. We have  been engaged by the National Disability Insurance Agency (NDIA) to provide local area coordination to ensure people with disability programs experience a smooth transition to the National Disability Insurance Scheme (NDIS).
This is a far-reaching undertaking and the changes required to existing disability support systems are significant.

The Society provides Local Area Coordination (LAC) services in the Central Coast, Hunter New England, South Western Sydney, South East Sydney and Sydney districts of NSW.
* Work closely with Senior Operations Managers,  District Managers and Team Leaders to ensure local district learning and development needs are understood and met.
* Build and maintain strong relationships with internal and external stakeholders, including the NDIA L&D Team, to ensure the effectiveness and alignment of LAC learning and development strategies.
* Work closely with the People and Culture team to provide wrap-around services to LAC employees.
*Build dashboards for all learning, monitor and report regularly on training and projects. 
*Manager, lead, coach and mentor a team of LAC L&D Facilitators, Designer and Administrator to deliver best practice solutions.
*Drive business projects through planning, organising, managing of resources, meet deliverables for the recruitment of new employees across all regions.
* Develop and maintain a strong understanding of the Society, the NDIS and LAC context, strategic priorities and local issues and identify implications for learning and development
* Ensure alignment of the Society and NDIA strategy within the LAC Program to the values and culture
* Monitor and evaluate LAC program and L&D strategies and initiatives to ensure quality.

SUPPLIERS TO CONSTRUCTION - OPPORTUNITY FOR 100s OF MILLIONS OF SALES
The residential construction industry is in a phase of transition, with the use of online software to manage everything from estimates, to quotes to purchasing rapidly gaining pace. This opens up a unique opportunity for suppliers to the industry to connect with their builder and trades customers, at the point of purchase. 

IdeationX represents the main platform in the Australian market, which processes tens of thousands of quotes worth billions of dollars every year. One in four quotes are won and managed through the platform.  Please contact me for further information in this.  

CPG & WHOLESALE DISTRIBUTION - MANAGEMENT INNOVATION

This program was a true complete transformation covering approximately 90% of business processes across this fast growing company in 3 continents and impacting almost all staff.   
Reporting to the COO, Stephen was responsible for the overall global transformation.  The objectives were to overhaul business applications to support growth.    In the first stage, Stephen mapped business process and completed strategy.  Following this within only 2 years we implemented the following:

- 20+ years professional experience in marketing, brand strategy, innovation, category management, market research, P&L ownership, account management and cross functional team roles
 - Experience across both regional and global roles including management of global licensees  
 - Diverse category experience across beverages and FMCG goods  
 - Key stakeholder engagement & management skills
 - Ability to lead teams to deliver excellent execution and commercial results across an array of projects
 - Extensive budget & finance management with a focus on delivering strong commercial outcomes to businesses
 - Strong strategy & planning skills coupled with demonstrated cross functional collaboration & leadership skills  
 - Technical marketing skills with an ability to develop and manage large scale commercial projects, retailer activations, ATL campaigns and NPD to deliver strong brand growth, consumer engagement and retailer buy in.

jobs.jobTitle: Senior Group Marketing Manager - Premium Brands & Innovation
jobs.description:
•	Accountable for the strategic marketing planning across Premium & Lifestyle Brands in ANZ markets to deliver NSR of $180m, 2.4 million cases, with a marketing budget of $5.5M and develop a team of 4.
•	Responsible for all portfolio functions including strategic brand planning (globally & domestically), P&L delivery, innovations, activations, media planning, digital, PR and communication.
•	Development of the 3-5 year global plans, 2-3 year brand plans & subsequent category and shopper marketing plans in line with retailer strategic imperatives 
•	Drive engagement with key internal stakeholders including the CMO, ANZ MD, Regional GMs, Sales & Global Teams and key functional leads on the strategic direction of key projects & initiatives throughout the year.

general.headline: Global leader of technology delivery and digital innovation

jobs.description:
Global accountability and leadership for digital innovation, digital service delivery and
      measurement/analytics for all marketing and direct to consumer engagement including
      our beautiful wineries located throughout Australia, New Zealand, United States and
      
      Italy.

Leadership and management for the development and launch of a new premium direct to consumer community in mainland China. Adopted lean startup principles to launch our MVP within 100 days including establishing local route to market for direct to consumer fulfillment and meeting all compliance and legal requirements to operate an online business within China.

Leadership of a digital transformation program to re-establish core digital platforms
      covering CRM, eCommerce, content management, marketing automation and social
      relationship management to improve our consumer and employee experiences and
      
      improve our digital agility and scalability.

Ozwide Group is the trusted partner of Australian business and industry to deliver the next generation of energy solutions.

We have been operating for 10 years delivering high profile energy efficiency programs, smart metering deployments and electrical contracting services. We deliver real business advantage and benefits to our clients across Australia, backed by an unwavering commitment to safety and quality in everything we do.

Our team of energy solutions experts never stop in the search for a better way to unlock even greater value, sustainability and competitive advantage for our clients.

I am a company director, and lead technology & innovation strategy development and support implementation to achieve our goal to be the most innovative energy efficiency and field services provider to utilities, retailers and asset owners across Australia.

Responsible for delivery of an end-to-end smart metering solution including AMI
      metering, 4G/WiMAX communications network deployment, meter data management,
      
      analytics and operational support systems.

Provided executive program and technology advisory for a multi-year smart meter roll-out within a large energy distributor in Victoria, Australia.

Led technical development with a globally dispersed team based in Australia, United States and India for a multi-year business transformation program in a leading Australian insurer. Established a new off-shore team and processes to support technical design, build and testing activities.

Led a detailed project health check and subsequent restructure/rebaselining for a significant systems implementation project in a leading Australian university.

Led local and off-shore technical development for a AU$10m project with a leading
      global life insurer to deliver a new automated underwriting platform to enable straight
      through processing and acceptance of life applications.
